THE HIGHLANDS.Definition: an area with mountains, especially in Scotland

SKIRTS.Definition: a type of clothing without legs

HAGGIS.Definition: a traditional Scottish type of food

BENEATH THE SURFACE.Definition: if you take a better look

INVENTIVENESS.Definition: the quality of creativity and originality

PICTURE.Definition: form an image in your mind

DENSELY.Definition: when many things or people are concentrated in an area, thickly

INVENTIONS.Definition: things that have never been made before

INVENTED.Definition: made/created something for the first time

REFRIGERATORS.Definition: equipment that uses cold temperature to keep food fresh

DISPOSABLE.Definition: something designed to be used once and then thrown away

CONTACT LENS.Definition: a small round plastic piece, worn on the surface of the eye to improve sight

ATM.Definition: a machine where one can use banking services

BANCOMAT.Definition: a machine where one can use banking services

INVENTORS.Definition: people who have created something for the first time

RIVAL.Definition: someone who competes for the same thing

ACCURACY.Definition: the fact of being exact and correct

HUNG.Definition: killed by tying a rope attached from above around his neck

DRAWN.Definition: looking exhausted, in a very bad shape

OBEY.Definition: do as you are told by someone

ALLIANCE.Definition: a union of countries formed in order to work together towards a common goal

HATRED.Definition: a very strong feeling of dislike and hostility

ALL THINGS CONSIDERED.Definition: used for saying that you have thought carefully about something before expressing an opinion about it

OVERNIGHT.Definition: fast, within a duration of a night

MONARCH.Definition: a single person that rules, king or queen

HEIRS.Definition: persons who are next in line to become kings or queens

COLONIALISM.Definition: the practise of one country controlling another one

COLONISE.Definition: send people to live in and take control of another country

CONCESSIONS.Definition: things that are given, especially in response to demands

SELF-GOVERNANCE.Definition: the ability of a nation to be ruled by its people and not by outsiders

PARLIAMENT.Definition: a group of people who make the laws for their country

REFERENDUM.Definition: a vote in order to make an important decision about a country's future

MARGIN.Definition: the amount by which something is different from something else

OPINION POLLS.Definition: acts of asking people questions to discover what they think about a subject

PRESUMABLY.Definition: based on what we know, although not entirely sure

CURRENCY.Definition: the money used in a particular country

NEGOTIATIONS.Definition: discussion aimed at reaching an agreement

CULTURAL HERITAGE.Definition: ways of living passed from one generation to another

MUTUAL.Definition: having the same feeling and behaviour towards each other
